SELECT msbpr.option3 as equipmentBarCode, msbpr.create_time as createDate, ee.equipment_name as equipmentName FROM mes_sfc_barcode_process_record msbpr left join eam_equipment_barcode eeb on eeb.equipment_barcode = msbpr.option3 left join eam_equipment ee on ee.equipment_id = eeb.equipment_id
and date_format(msbpr.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
AND msbpr.pass_station_count = 1
GROUP BY msbpr.option3
